text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Good job Trump! You are a strong leader capable of silencing every dictator especially from Africa. You make us proud of US. Please Uganda needs help to remove the evil dictator Museveni! He is using WHO money to kill and destroy Ugandans. He lied that ther was coronavirus in Ug.
